snippet: Goldman Sachs is among the last big Wall Street banks to settle claims for selling flawed mortgage securities.
abstract: Goldman Sachs agrees to pay civil settlement of up to $5 billion over claims that it marketed and sold faulty mortgage securities to investors in lead up to financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is among the last big Wall Street banks to settle claims for selling flawed mortgage securities.

headline.main: Goldman to Pay Up to $5 Billion to Settle Claims of Faulty Mortgages
